# the `iris` dataset

::: {.cell execution_count=1}
``` {.python .cell-code}
from sklearn import datasets
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split

iris = datasets.load_iris()
X = iris.data
y = iris.target
X_train, X_test, y_train, y_test = train_test_split(X, y, test_size=0.15)
```
:::
